title: Beautiful 1 Bedroom For Rent
posting_body: - Granite counter tops, breakfast bar and white hardwood cabinetry
- Full size white appliances including: dishwasher, microwave, stove and fridge
- Bathroom with marble tiling, contemporary fixtures and bathtub
- Central HVAC (heat and air conditioning are tenant paid and controlled)
- Ample closet space with custom fit organizers
In Lincoln Park, Chicago's "City in a Garden"—truly comes to life.
Historic churches and handsome brick row houses nestled within landmark districts sit next to peaceful parks, while quiet, tree-lined residential areas give way to bustling business corridors.
If interested, please text Natalie at 312-637-0853 for the fastest response to schedule a showing.
The building is managed by Kass Management.
